short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to test auto ordering process for Amazon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It is a free extension to perform an auto ordering process at Amazon to test. This will work with an customize API to collect orders from your dedicated directory whether a database or an excel file.
